about.title: About Altus Finance
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner for all your financing projects since 2020
about.intro1: Altus Finance Group is an online financing platform specialized in personal and professional loans. Our mission is to make access to credit simple, fast and transparent for everyone.
about.intro2: Founded in 2020, our company aims to democratize access to financing through technology and a customer-centric approach. We believe that every project deserves support, which is why we offer financing solutions adapted to both individuals and professionals.
about.expertiseDesc: A team of professionals at your service
about.commitmentText: At Altus Finance, we are committed to providing quality service based on transparency, responsiveness and personalized support. Each request is carefully reviewed by our experts to offer you the best financing solution.
about.transparencyDesc: Rates and conditions clearly displayed, no hidden fees
about.speedDesc: Initial response within 48h and disbursement in 72h
about.supportDesc: A dedicated team to advise you at every step
about.flexibilityDesc: Solutions adapted to your personal or professional situation
about.innovationValueDesc: A 100% online platform to simplify your procedures
about.legalDisclaimer: Altus Finance Group is a credit institution approved by the Autorité de Contrôle Prudentiel et de Résolution (ACPR). Subject to ACPR control - 4 Place de Budapest, CS 92459, 75436 Paris Cedex 09.

howItWorks.pageTitle: How to get a loan | Altus Finance
howItWorks.pageDescription: Discover how to get a loan in 4 simple steps with Altus Finance. Free simulation, quick response within 48h, funds disbursement in 72h.
howItWorks.title: How to get your loan in
howItWorks.subtitle: A 100% online process, fast and transparent to finance your projects
howItWorks.step1Desc: Use our online simulator to estimate your monthly payments and find the offer that fits your budget.
howItWorks.step2Title: 2. Sign up in a few clicks
howItWorks.step2Desc: Create your account in seconds to access your secure personal space and submit your loan application.
howItWorks.step3Title: 3. Complete your application from My Account
howItWorks.step3Desc: Log in to your dashboard and fill out the application form with your information. Everything is done 100% online.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Our team analyzes your application and gives you an initial response within 48h. Track the progress in real-time in your account.
howItWorks.whyUsSubtitle: A modern platform designed to simplify your access to financing
howItWorks.secureDesc: Your data is protected and encrypted
howItWorks.personalizedDesc: A dedicated team to advise you
howItWorks.faqA1: For a loan application, you will need an ID, a recent proof of address, and your last 3 pay slips (or proof of income for professionals).
howItWorks.faqA2: Yes, early repayment is free at Altus Finance. You can repay all or part of your loan at any time without additional fees.
howItWorks.faqA3: Our acceptance rate varies depending on profiles, but we carefully review each application. Even if you have been refused elsewhere, do not hesitate to make a simulation.
howItWorks.faqQ4: How do I track my application?
howItWorks.faqA4: Once your application is submitted, you can track its progress in real-time in your 'My Account' client area. You will also receive email notifications at each step.
